package.cmpEditor:
<?php
$fields=explode("\n",$fields);
$columns0=explode("\n",$columns);
$columns=array();
foreach($columns0 as $i=>$col0){
  $col=explode(",",$col0);
  $c=array(
    "text"=>$col[0],
    "sortable"=>true,
    "dataIndex"=>$fields[$i],
    "align"=>(@$col[2]?$col[2]:'left'),
  );
  if($col[1])$c["width"]=$col[1]*1;
  else $c["flex"]=1;
  $columns[]=$c;
}
$toolbar0=explode("\n",$toolbar);
$toolbar=array();
foreach($toolbar0 as $i=>$v)if($v){
  $u=explode(",",$v);
  $o=new StdClass();
  $o->text=$u[0];
  $o->icon=$u[1];
  $o->link=$u[2];
  $o->title=@$u[3]?$u[3]:$u[0];
  $toolbar[]=$o;
}
?>
(function(){
var grilla=Ext.create('Ext.grid.Panel', {
  title: <?=json_encode($title)?>,
  store: new Ext.data.JsonStore({
    proxy: {
      type: 'ajax',
      url: '../grilla/data?_zdata=<?='<?= URLencode( $_zdata ) ?>' ?>',
      reader: {
        type: 'json',
        root: 'data'
      }
    },         
    autoLoad:true,
    remoteSort:true,
    fields:<?=json_encode($fields)?>
  }),
  columns: <?=json_encode($columns) ?>,
  tbar:[
<?php
  foreach($toolbar as $tb) if($tb){
?>
    {
      text:<?=$json_encode($tb->text)?>,
      icon:"../../images/16/<?=$tb->icon?>",
      handler:function($this){
        loadWindow($this.ownerCt.ownerCt,
          {fragment:<?=json_encode($tb->link)?>},
          {
            title:<?=$json_encode($tb->title)?>,
            listeners:{
              destroy:function(){
                grilla.store.load();
              }
            }
          }
        );
      }
    },
<?php
  }
?>
  ],
  viewConfig: {
    stripeRows: true
  }
});
return grilla;
})()

zfapplication.file:
<?php
require_once("zparser.php");

/**
 * $columns: COL1, COL2, COLX AS COL3
 * $columns separado por comas
 * $where: codicion1, condicion2, condicion3 ==> condicion1 and condicion2 and condicion3
 * $where separado por comas
 */
class zIterator {
  public $adapter = 'connection';
  public $query = '';
  public $model = '';
  public $columns = '';
  public $where = '';
  public $report = '';
  public $security = '';

  function onload($dataId){
    $_SESSION[$dataId]=new stdClass();
  }
  function onread($id){}
  function oncount($id){return null;}
  function oninsert($id,$values){return $values;}

  static function createDataInstance($name){
    $id = uniqid("$name,");
    return $id;
  }

  function fetchRow($dataId){
    $data = $_SESSION[$dataId];
    //var_dump($data, $dataId);
    if(!empty($this->query)){
      require_once("Zend/Db/Table/Row.php");
      require_once("../model/{$this->adapter}.php");
      $db = Zend_Db_Table_Abstract::getDefaultAdapter();
      $values = array();
      foreach((array)$data as $a=>$b){
        $values[":$a"]=$b;
      }
      $stmt = $db->query($this->query,$values);
      return $stmt->fetch();
    }
    if(empty($this->model)) return null;
    $model = $this->model;
    $columns = $this->columns;
    $where = $this->where;
    require_once("../model/{$model}.php");
    $_table=new $model();
    $select=$_table->select();
    @$_limit = null;
    @$_offset = null;
    @$_order = null;
    $select->limit($_limit,$_offset);
    if(isset($_order) && (trim($_order)!="")) $select->order($_order);
    $select->from($_table);
    $eColumns = zparser::columns($columns, '$select');
    foreach($eColumns as $c) eval($c);
    $eWhere = zparser::where(str_replace('$data->','$data_',$where), '$select');
    //var_dump($where,str_replace('$data_','$data->',$eWhere));
    foreach($eWhere as $w) eval(str_replace('$data_','$data->', $w));

    $row = $_table->fetchRow($select);
    return $row;
  }
  function fetchAll($dataId,$start=null,$limit=null,$page=1,$sort=null){
    $data = $_SESSION[$dataId];
    if(!empty($this->query)){
      require_once("Zend/Db/Statement.php");
      require_once("../model/{$this->adapter}.php");
      $db = Zend_Db_Table_Abstract::getDefaultAdapter();
      $values = array();
      foreach((array)$data as $a=>$b){
        $values[":".$a]=$b;
      }
      $stmt = $db->query($this->query, $values);
      $rows = array();
      while(true){
        $data = $stmt->fetch();
        if(!$data) break;
        $rows[] = $data;
      }
      return $rows;
    }
    if(empty($this->model)) return null;
    $model = $this->model;
    $columns = $this->columns;
    $where = $this->where;
    require_once("../model/{$model}.php");
    $_table=new $model();
    $select=$_table->select();
    @$_limit = $limit;
    @$_offset = $start;
    $select->limit($_limit,$_offset);
    $select->from($_table);
    $eColumns = zparser::columns($columns, '$select');
    foreach($eColumns as $c) eval($c);
    $eWhere = zparser::where(str_replace('$data->','$data_',$where), '$select');
    //var_dump($where,str_replace('$data_','$data->',$eWhere));
    foreach($eWhere as $w) eval(str_replace('$data_','$data->', $w));
    /**
     * AGREGA FILTRO AUTOMATICO DE CODIGO
     */
    if(array_search('CODIGO',explode(',',strtoupper($this->security)))!==false){
      $select->where("CODIGO=?",$_SESSION["usuario"]["codigo"]);
    }
    ////
    if($sort){
      foreach($sort as $s) {
        $select->order($s->property . " " . $s->direction);
      }
    }

    $rows = $_table->fetchAll($select);
    return $rows;
  }
  function count($dataId){
    $c = $this->onread($dataId);
    if(isset($c)) return $c;
    $data = $_SESSION[$dataId];
    if(!empty($this->query)){
    }
    if(empty($this->model)) return null;
    $model = $this->model;
    $where = $this->where;
    require_once("../model/{$model}.php");

    $_tableC=new $model();
    $selectC=$_tableC->select();
    $selectC->from($_tableC);
    $selectC->columns(array('C'=>'count(*)'));
    $eWhereC = zparser::where(str_replace('$data->','$data_',$where), '$selectC');
    foreach($eWhereC as $w) eval(str_replace('$data_','$data->', $w));
    
    $row = $_tableC->fetchRow($selectC);
    $c = (0+@$row->C);
    return $c;
  }
  function insert($values){
    if(empty($this->model)) return null;
    $model = $this->model;
    require_once("../model/{$model}.php");
    $table=new $model();
    $info = $table->info();
    $dbValues = array();
    foreach($info["cols"] as $col){
      if(!empty($values[$col])) $dbValues[$col]=$values[$col];
    }
    $table ->insert ($dbValues);
  }
  function report($dataId, $values){
    $report = '../application/reports/' . $this->report;
    $data = $this->onreport($dataId, $values);
    $file = uniqid("proc");
    $outputFile = realpath("reports/")."/".$file.".pdf";
    $f=fopen("../tmp/$file","w");
    fwrite($f, realpath($report)."\n");
    fwrite($f, $outputFile."\n");
    fwrite($f, 'com.mysql.jdbc.Driver'."\n");
    fwrite($f, 'jdbc:mysql://localhost/test'."\n");
    fwrite($f, 'root'."\n");
    fwrite($f, 'root'."\n");
    foreach($data as $name => $value){
      fwrite($f, $name."\n");
      fwrite($f, $value."\n");
    }
    fclose($f);
    $file = realpath("../tmp/$file");
    $path = getcwd();
    chdir(realpath('../library/jasper/'));
    $res = exec('run.bat '.escapeshellarg($file));
    chdir($path);
    return $outputFile;
  }
}

<?php

  class zParser {
    /**
     * Parse a criteria expresion like:
     *  field1 > dbfunction($phpvariable), field2 = @phpfunction($phpvariable), field3 = @phpfn(phpconstant)
     * convertion:
     *  $select->where('field1 > dbfunction(?)',$phpvariable);
     *  $select->where('field2 = ?',phpfunction($phpvariable));
     *  $select->where('field3 = ?',phpfn(phpconstant));
     */
    public static function where($criteria,$select='$select'){
      $res=array();
      if(isset($criteria)) {
        $token = token_get_all('<?php '.$criteria.';');
        $vars=array();
        $exp="";
        for($i=1,$l=count($token);$i<$l;$i++){
          $t=$token[$i];
          if(is_string($t) && $t!=";" && $t!="@") $exp.=$t;
          elseif($t==="@" || (is_array($t) && $t[0]==T_VARIABLE)){
            $exp.="%s";
            $cont=$t=="@"?array(array(307,309)):array();
            if($t=="@")$i++;
            $lasti=$i;
            for($j=$i;$j<$l;$j++){
              if(is_string($token[$j])) {$e=$token[$j];$k=0;} else {$e=$token[$j][1];$k=$token[$j][0];}
              if(trim($e)=="") {}
              elseif(@$e=="->") $cont[]=array(307,309);
              elseif(@$e=="[") $cont[]=array("]");
              elseif(@$e=="(") $cont[]=array(")");
              elseif(count($cont)==0) break;
              elseif(count($cont)>0){
                foreach($cont as $kco => $co){
                  foreach($co as $coi){
                    if($coi===$e || ($coi==$k && !is_string($coi))){
                      $lasti=$j;
                      unset($cont[$kco]);
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
            $var="";
            for($j=$i;$j<=$lasti;$j++) $var.=is_string($token[$j])?$token[$j]:$token[$j][1];
            $vars[]=$var;
            $i=$lasti;
          } elseif(is_array($t)) {
            $exp.=$t[1];
          }
          elseif($t==";") {
            if(trim($exp)) {
              $exp=var_export($exp,true);
              if($vars){
                $xvars=$vars;
                foreach($xvars as &$xvar) $xvar=var_export("'.{$select}->getAdapter()->quote($xvar).'",true);
                $xvars[0]='"?"';
                eval('$exp=sprintf($exp,'.implode(',',$xvars).');');
                $res[]="{$select}->where($exp,$vars[0]);\n";
              } else {
                $res[]="{$select}->where($exp);\n";
              }
            }
            $vars=array();
            $exp="";
          }
        }
      }
      return $res;
    }
    public static function parse($str,$separator=';'){
      $res='';
      if(isset($str)) {
        $tks=array();
        $token = token_get_all('<?php '.$str.$separator);
        $cont0=array();
        $tk=array();
        for($i=1,$l=count($token);$i<$l;$i++){
          $t=$token[$i];
          if(is_string($token[$i])) {$e=$token[$i];$k=0;} else {$e=$token[$i][1];$k=$token[$i][0];}
          //Verifica () [] y {} en la expresion de base de datos
          if($e=="(")$cont0[]=array(")");
          if($e=="[")$cont0[]=array("]");
          if($e=="{")$cont0[]=array("}");
          if(count($cont0)>0){
            foreach($cont0 as $kco => $co){
              foreach($co as $coi){
                if($coi===$e || ($coi==$k && !is_string($coi))){
                  unset($cont0[$kco]);
                }
              }
            }
          }
          if(is_string($t) && $t!=$separator && $t!="@") $tk[]=array(0,$t);
          elseif($t==="@" || (is_array($t) && $t[0]==T_VARIABLE)){
            $cont=$t=="@"?array(array(307,309)):array();
            if($t=="@")$i++;
            $lasti=$i;
            for($j=$i;$j<$l;$j++){
              if(is_string($token[$j])) {$e=$token[$j];$k=0;} else {$e=$token[$j][1];$k=$token[$j][0];}
              //Verifica -> () [] y {} en la expresion php
              if(trim($e)=="") {}
              elseif(@$e=="->") $cont[]=array(307,309);
              elseif(@$e=="[") $cont[]=array("]");
              elseif(@$e=="(") $cont[]=array(")");
              elseif(@$e=="{") $cont[]=array("}");
              elseif(count($cont)==0) break;
              elseif(count($cont)>0){
                foreach($cont as $kco => $co){
                  foreach($co as $coi){
                    if($coi===$e || ($coi==$k && !is_string($coi))){
                      $lasti=$j;
                      unset($cont[$kco]);
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
            $var="";
            for($j=$i;$j<=$lasti;$j++) $var.=is_string($token[$j])?$token[$j]:$token[$j][1];
            $tk[]=array(1,$var);
            $i=$lasti;
          } elseif(is_array($t)) {
            $tk[]=array(0,$t[1]);
          }
          elseif($t==$separator && (count($cont0)==0)) { //valid separator
            if(count($tk)) $tks[]=$tk;
            $tk=array();
          }
          else { //invalid separador
            $tk[]=array(0,$t);
          }
        }
      }
      return $tks;
    }
    protected static function quote($xvar,$select='$select'){
      return "{$select}->getAdapter()->quote($xvar)";
    }
    protected static function quoteIdentifier($xvar,$select='$select'){
      return "{$select}->getAdapter()->quoteIdentifier($xvar)";
    }
    /**
     * Parse from
     */
    public static function from($columns,$select='$select'){
      $tks = zparser::parse($columns,',');
      $cols=array();
      foreach($tks as $tk){
        $res='';$exp='';
        foreach($tk as $i=>$t){
          if($t[0]==1){
            //php
            $res.="'.".zparser::quoteIdentifier($t[1],$select).".'";
          } elseif(strtoupper($t[1])=="AS") {
            $exp = $res;
            $res='';
          } else {
            //sql
            $res.=substr(var_export($t[1],true),1,-1);
          }
        }
        if($exp){
          //alias
          $cols[]="array('".trim($res)."'=>'".trim($exp)."')";
        } else {
          $cols[]="'$res'";
        }
      }
      $res=array();
      foreach($cols as $t){
        $t=str_replace(array("''.",".''"),"",$t);
        $res[]="{$select}->from($t);";
      }
      return $res;
    }
    /**
     * Parse Columns
     */
    public static function columns($columns,$select='$select'){
      $tks = zparser::parse($columns,',');
      $cols=array();
      foreach($tks as $tk){
        $res='';$exp='';
        $quoter="quote";
        foreach($tk as $i=>$t){
          if($t[0]==1){
            //php
            $res.="'.".zparser::$quoter($t[1],$select).".'";
          } elseif(strtoupper($t[1])=="AS") {
            $exp = $res;
            $res='';
            $quoter="quoteIdentifier";
          } else {
            //sql
            $res.=substr(var_export($t[1],true),1,-1);
          }
        }
        if($exp){
          //alias and expression: new Zend_Db_Expr('p.cost * 1.08') === '(p.cost * 1.08)'
          $cols[]="array(".str_replace(array("''.",".''"),"","'".trim($res)."'")."=>'(".trim($exp).")')";
        } else {
          $cols[]="'$res'";
        }
      }
      $res=array();
      foreach($cols as $c){
        $t=str_replace(array("''.",".''"),"",$c);
        $res[]="{$select}->columns($c);";
      }
      return $res;
    }
  }

controller.name: reporte
ide
